patthana15.27:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.27:0.3_0: this is the point, the bride of the skillful.
patthana15.27:1.1_0: Neither sees the skillful. Noble One is a cause.
patthana15.27:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
patthana15.27:2.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the unskillful is a cause and reason.
patthana15.27:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
patthana15.27:3.1_0: You haven’t declared a cause or condition for the reason.
patthana15.27:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
